name: Noshin Sadat
summary: I have recently graduated from the University of Waterloo with a Master of Mathematics in Computer Science and I am looking to get my feet wet in the Data Engineering industry. I have a natural affinity for problem-solving. This developed into a genuine interest in pursuing a career in Computer Science and led me to pursue both an undergraduate and a graduate degree in this field. I got particularly interested in working with data and did several projects related to the same. I have gained strong programming skills in Java and R while working on assignments and projects. I also worked as Lecturer for Data Structures, Algorithms, and Introduction to Programming courses where the main language in practice was Java. This has helped me to develop a strong understanding of the concepts of Object-Oriented Programming. During my downtime, I like reading, listening to music, hanging out with friends and family, and sight-seeing. My career goal is to be able to solve real-world problems with the knowledge and experiences I gain.
